parameters.formDescription: Create stunning AI-powered music videos from your songs

values.placeholder: Paste lyrics here or leave empty for auto-extraction
Enter image URLs (one per line) for visual reference

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({projectId: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.projectId, scenes: $json.scenes, videoEngine: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.videoEngine, aspectRatio: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.aspectRatio, referenceImages: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.referenceImages}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({projectId: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.projectId, scenes: $json.scenes, visualStyle: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.visualStyle, referenceImages: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.referenceImages}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({projectId: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.projectId, videoClips: $json.videoClips, audioUrl: $('Store Analysis Results').item.json.analysisData.audioUrl, lyrics: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.lyrics, lyricOverlay: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.lyricOverlay, analysisData: $('Store Analysis Results').item.json.analysisData}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({projectId: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.projectId, finalVideoUrl: $json.finalVideoUrl, audioUrl: $('Store Analysis Results').item.json.analysisData.audioUrl, images: $('Merge Video & Images').item.json.images}) }}

assignments.name: output
assignments.value: ={{ {projectId: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.projectId, status: 'completed', finalVideoUrl: $json.finalVideoUrl || null, socialMediaPack: $json.socialMediaContent || null, images: $json.images || [], createdAt: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.createdAt, completedAt: $now.toISO()} }}

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({personalizations: [{to: [{email: $('Normalize Input Data').item.json.notificationEmail}]}], from: {email: 'noreply@yourdomain.com', name: 'AI Music Video Generator'}, subject: 'Your Music Video is Ready! ðŸŽ¬', content: [{type: 'text/html', value: '

Your music video is ready!

Project ID: ' + $json.output.projectId + '

Video URL: ' + ($json.output.finalVideoUrl || 'N/A') + '

'}]}) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={"error": "Missing required field: songUrl", "message": "Please provide a valid song URL or upload an audio file"}
